message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features that we believe will greatly enhance your experience. For a limited time, I'm offering it to you at an introductory price of $150. Don't miss out on this opportunity to upgrade your lifestyle!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $100. Would it be possible for you to lower the price slightly?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and would like to accommodate you while still valuing our product's worth. I am willing to offer the product at $125, which I believe strikes a good balance between affordability and the value provided by our item.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to accommodate my budget. However, I am still looking to stay within a $100 limit. Could you consider lowering the price further?

I understand your situation, Bob, and I'm glad you're interested in our product. To reach a compromise, I'm willing to offer the product at $110. This price reflects a reasonable discount while still acknowledging the value and quality of our item.
